thread.title: Naomie Harris on Control, Complacency, and Losing Herself in Moonlight
thread.title_full: Naomie Harris on Control, Complacency, and Losing Herself in Moonlight

author: Elizabeth Day
title: Naomie Harris on Control, Complacency, and Losing Herself in Moonlight
text: In another setting, you could imagine Naomie Harris as the perfect Girl Scout. Teachers doubtless would have said she had a good head on her shoulders. Over lunch in London, she drinks only sparkling water, having been a teetotaler for all of her 40 years. “I’m so Miss Control Freak,”... More »
